Brawler.desc: Brawlers are monstrous fighters in battle that deal a lot damage.

Knight.desc: Knight replenishes their resources with each takedown.
Knight.passive_ability: For every takedown you are healed to maximum health and refill your inventory with soups.
Knight.details1: If the refill variable is set higher than the inventory capacity, then refill to maximum inventory capacity.
Knight.details2: If the heal variable is set higher than the health capacity, then set health to maximum health capacity.

Alpha.desc: Alpha becomes a lot more fierceful with the pack.
Alpha.active_ability: Summon wolves that attacks your last hit target.
Alpha.details1: Both you and your wolves gain speed during the duration of the ability.
Alpha.details2: The wolves should be able to damage themselves from the Hedgehog passive ability.

Viking.desc: Viking is a relentless force driven by rage, feared amongst everyone.
Viking.passive_ability: Weakens opponents for every tenth hit onto you for a duration.
Viking.active_ability: Summon a lightning bolt on the selected target and deal half of their current health as pre-mitigation damage and set opponent ablaze for a duration.
Viking.details1: The weakness applies onto the enemies after the enemies have hit Viking 10 times, the weakness stacks caps at Weakness 3.

Basilisk.desc: Basilisk strives in long term battles poisoning opponents.
Basilisk.passive_ability: Every tenth hit poison enemies and grants speed for a short duration.
Basilisk.details1: Whilst the enemy is poisoned, Fatal Wounds is applied.

Warrior.desc: Warrior is blessed by the heavens after each takedown.
Warrior.passive_ability: For every takedown you are granted strength, speed, resistance and regeneration for a duration.
Warrior.details1: The great buffs resets on takedown, it does not stack, also gain protection 1 on your helmet.
Warrior.details2: Immune to all negative effects during great buffs.

Slayer.desc: Slayer is unmatched in raw brutal strength.
Slayer.passive_ability: Restores health when successfully landing a critical strike.
Slayer.active_ability: Grants additional levels of sharpness for a duration.

Challenger.desc: Challenger may weaken a soul until either one is vanquished.
Challenger.passive_ability: Deal additional pre-mitigation damage every third hit.
Challenger.active_ability: Permanently weaken your selected target untill either one dies.
Challenger.details1: Cannot weaken Warrior while affected by Great Buffs.

Shaman.desc: Shaman may enter spirit mode to gain advantage in combat.
Shaman.passive_ability: Heal a portion of your damage dealt post-mitigation and take reduced damage.
Shaman.active_ability: Entering spirit mode allows you to slow your target and steal all positive effects from your target.
Shaman.details1: Does not steal negative effects from target.
Shaman.details2: Puts ability on cooldown even if the target has no effects to steal, since slow is still applied.
Shaman.details3: Effects last as long as you are in spirit mode and are given back to the original player when exiting spirit mode.
Shaman.details4: Refresh the duration of spirit mode by hitting a player.
Shaman.details5: Shaman is unable to steal Great Buffs from Warrior nor apply a slow during Great Buffs, still puts the ability on cooldown.

Vampire.desc: Vampire sustains by draining the lifeforce of their opponents.
Vampire.passive_ability: Lifesteal 80% of damage dealt post-mitigation and deal additional damage based on the missing health of the target.
Vampire.active_ability: Entering a bloodlust grants speed and increases lifesteal to 160% for a duration.
Vampire.details1: Will not spawn with any soups and also cannot use soups to restore health and can neither access refills.

Alchemist.desc: Alchemist wield forbidden magical brews to gain the upper hand in battle.
Alchemist.passive_ability: For every takedown, you brew arcane potions.
potions: 1. Splash Potion of Harming       | n/a | 2x | 100% Chance

Duelist.desc: Specialises in aggressive playstyles to outplay an opponent.

Fisherman.desc: Fisherman may teleport hooked enemies to them or may leap forward on marked location.
Fisherman.active_ability: Teleports hooked players to your location or leap forward.
Fisherman.details1: Teleported players will be facing the direction you are facing when teleporting them.
Fisherman.details2: Fisherman is granted Projectile Protection 10, Feather Falling 2 on Leggings.

Bomber.desc: Bomber causes devastating area damage with explosive attacks.
Bomber.passive_ability: Takedown with TNT grants more TNT and triple gold.
Bomber.details1: Bomber is granted Blast Protection 10 and Feather Falling 5 on Boots.

Ninja.desc: Ninja is able to quickly position themselves behind their target in the blink of an eye.
Ninja.passive_ability: Teleporting makes you dodge all incoming attacks and projectiles for a short duration.
Ninja.active_ability: Teleport behind your last hit target or closest target.
Ninja.details1: The ability should not be put on cooldown if no one is in range.
Ninja.details2: Spawns with 8 enderpearls, every takedown grants new enderpearls with a cap of 8.
Ninja.details3: Enderpearl teleportation also apply the passive.
Ninja.details4: Ninja is granted Feather Falling 10 on Boots.

Monkey.desc: Monkey is a trickster whom has mastered the art of confusion.
Monkey.active_ability1: Change opponents currently held item to another slot in their hotbar.
Monkey.active_ability2: Become invisible for a short duration.
Monkey.details1: Monkey is granted Projectile Protection 6 on Leggings.

Hyper.desc: Hyper is insanely agile on their feet.
Hyper.passive_ability: Increases speed level for every third hit.
Hyper.details1: Speed level decreases back to level 2 after 4 seconds of not hitting any players.

Rogue.desc: Rogue is a master of stealth whom may go completely invisible.
Rogue.active_ability: Go completely invisible, you also gain additional levels of sharpness for the duration.

Phoenix.desc: Phoenix soars unfettered, dashing with boundless freedom in any direction.
Phoenix.passive_ability: Health restoration by soups is increased by 25%
Phoenix.active_ability: Gain the ability to double jump and dash horizontally.
Phoenix.details1: May not launch themselves upwards or downwards if applicable.
Phoenix.details2: Should negate all forms of fall damage.

Pirate.desc: Pirate excels at plundering, earning gold and golden apples for each takedown.
Pirate.passive_ability: For every takedown you are granted double gold and golden apples.
Pirate.active_ability: Consuming a golden apple will cleanse all debuffs.

Ranged.desc: Damage opponents from afar whilst keeping your distance.

Inferno.desc: Inferno shoots flaming arrows that sets opponents ablaze on arrow hit.
Inferno.passive_ability: Your arrows sets targets ablaze for a duration.

Scout.desc: Scout is extremely dangerous due to withering arrows which suffocates healing.
Scout.passive_ability: Every third hit on the same target applies wither and grants invisibility for a short duration.
Scout.details1: Whilst the enemy is withered, Immortal Wounds is applied.

Artillery.desc: Artillery has impeccable damage but has to be careful.
Artillery.passive_ability: Get one arrow every 5 seconds, if you do not have one already.
Artillery.details1: Refund the arrow if a player was hit.

Snowman.desc: Snowman slows opponents and is quick on their feet.
Snowman.passive_ability: Apply slowness on arrow hit for a short duration.

Tank.desc: Endure brutal amounts of unimaginable damage.

Star.desc: Star is forged with immense density emitting powerful darkness.
Star.passive_ability: Apply a strong slowness and blindness every 30th hit for a duration.
Star.active_ability: Stun nearby players in a radius of 5 blocks for a short duration, if at least one player is stunned, restore full health.
Star.details1: The stunned players may not be able to move at all, however they should be able to freely move their direction they are facing and still damage nearby players.
Star.details2: Do not restore any health if nobody was stunned in the area, and put the ability on cooldown.
Star.details3: Star has permanent Health Boost 10 and Slowness 1

Dragon.desc: Dragon is a scary combatant whom blasts targets aflame in an area.
Dragon.active_ability: Blasts enemies in a radius of 8 blocks to deal 4 hearts of pre-mitigation damage and also ignites blasted opponents for a short duration.

Hedgehog.desc: Hedgehog is extremely resiliant and shrugs damage off with ease.
Hedgehog.passive_ability: Thorn half of the opponents pre-mitigated melee damage back to the opponent.
Hedgehog.details1: Does not thorn projectile damage only melee damage.

Juggernaut.desc: Juggernaut is incredibly massive, being able to face tank anything.
Juggernaut.active_ability: Gain immense regeneration for a duration.
Juggernaut.details1: Juggernaut has permanent Slowness 1 and starts off with Health Boost 5.
Juggernaut.details2: Slowness is removed for the duration of the active.

Behemoth.desc: Behemoth is an ungodly titan, standing unbroken amidst the chaos.
Behemoth.passive_ability: Gain resistance for every 20% of maximum health lost.
Behemoth.active_ability: Gain absorption hearts for a duration.
Behemoth.details1: Maximum Resistance level stacking reached at 20% of maximum health.
